title: UK Heritage Tour

itinerary.title: London Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrive in London, visit Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and Westminster Abbey.

itinerary.title: London Museums & Markets
itinerary.description: Explore British Museum, Tower of London, and Borough Market.

itinerary.title: Stonehenge & Bath
itinerary.description: Day trip to mysterious Stonehenge and historic Roman Baths.

itinerary.title: Oxford & Cotswolds
itinerary.description: Visit Oxford University and explore charming Cotswolds villages.

itinerary.title: Windsor Castle
itinerary.description: Tour Windsor Castle, the oldest occupied castle in the world.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final day in London before airport transfer.

description: Discover Britain's royal heritage, historic landmarks, and charming countryside.
